Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout

Class PatternLayout.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.layout.PatternLayout.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<PatternLayout>, org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.util.Builder<PatternLayout>

    PatternLayout
    public static class PatternLayout.Builder
extends Object
implements org.apache.logging.log4j.plugins.util.Builder<PatternLayout>
    Custom PatternLayout builder. Use the builder factory method to create this.

        public PatternLayout.Builder setPattern​(String pattern)
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern. If not specified, defaults to DEFAULT_CONVERSION_PATTERN.

      • setPatternSelector

        public PatternLayout.Builder setPatternSelector​(PatternSelector patternSelector)
        Parameters:
        patternSelector - Allows different patterns to be used based on some selection criteria.

      • setConfiguration

        Parameters:

      • setCharset

        public PatternLayout.Builder setCharset​(Charset charset)
        Parameters:
        charset - The character set. The platform default is used if not specified.

      • setAlwaysWriteExceptions

        public PatternLayout.Builder setAlwaysWriteExceptions​(boolean alwaysWriteExceptions)
        Parameters:
        alwaysWriteExceptions - If "true" (default) exceptions are always written even if the pattern contains no exception tokens.

      • setDisableAnsi

        public PatternLayout.Builder setDisableAnsi​(boolean disableAnsi)
        Parameters:
        disableAnsi - If "true" (default is value of system property `log4j.skipJansi`, or `true` if undefined), do not output ANSI escape codes

      • setNoConsoleNoAnsi

        public PatternLayout.Builder setNoConsoleNoAnsi​(boolean noConsoleNoAnsi)
        Parameters:
        noConsoleNoAnsi - If "true" (default is false) and System.console() is null, do not output ANSI escape codes

      • setHeader

        public PatternLayout.Builder setHeader​(String header)
        Parameters:
        header - The header to place at the top of the document, once.

      • setFooter

        public PatternLayout.Builder setFooter​(String footer)
        Parameters:
        footer - The footer to place at the bottom of the document, once.
